price: Nuko bageze kwa se, baravuga bati “Dawe! Twahakaniwe kuzongera gupimirwa (ibiribwa tutajyanye n’umuvandimwe wacu Benjamini). None duhe umuvandimwe wacu tujyane, kugira ngo tuzapimirwe (ibiribwa), kandi rwose tuzamurinda.”
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falammā rajaʿū ilā abīhim qālū yāabānā muniʿa minnā al-kaylu fa-arsil maʿanā akhānā naktal wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
